Charlie: "I believe we should continue our investigation into Bob's connections to the mafia. Alice's reaction and demeanor during this discussion round have raised further red flags for me. Let us not forget that the mafioso among us may attempt to manipulate..."

Diana: "I believe we should all focus on gathering any information that could potentially lead us to the truth about Bob's death. It's important that we remain open-minded and consider all possibilities, without jumping to conclusions or accusing one another."

Diana was arrested
